name: Party Off
description:
This is a linear game for the "party" weekly game jam theme.  The synopsis of the game is to leave your friend's house in the middle of the party, and go on a crazy journey, meeting wacky characters along the way, some familiar and some new, all for the sake of heading home to play video games alone in the dark.

Controls:

W - Interacts
A - Moves left
D - Moves Right
Space bar - Jump

Thank you all, and I hope you enjoy this as much as I enjoyed making the game in 5 days!
